languages.text: {n}Пощада страдальчески морщится от ваших слов — роскошная броня самоуверенности больше не защищает его лицо. Бросив полный усталости взгляд на Джай и получив от нее утвердительный кивок, он тяжело вздыхает:{/n} "Это правда. Она стала совсем другой".

{n}Mercy winces in pain at your words, his face no longer guarded by the lavish armour of his self-assurance. After tossing a weary look at Jae and receiving an affirmative nod from her, he sighs heavily:{/n} "It is true. She is a different person now."
languages.original_text: {n}Пощада страдальчески морщится от ваших слов — роскошная броня самоуверенности больше не защищает его лицо. Бросив полный усталости взгляд на Джай и получив от нее утвердительный кивок, он тяжело вздыхает:{/n} "Это правда. Она стала совсем другой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Mercy winces in pain at your words, his face no longer guarded by the lavish armour of his self-assurance. After tossing a weary look at Jae and receiving an affirmative nod from her, he sighs heavily:{/n} "It is true. She is a different person now."
traits.speaker: Mercy

traits.locale_text: {n}Mercy winces in pain at your words, his face no longer guarded by the lavish armour of his self-assurance. After tossing a weary look at Jae and receiving an affirmative nod from her, he sighs heavily:{/n} "It is true. She is a different person now."
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}听到你的话，悯慈痛苦地抽搐了一下。他脸上自豪的表情消失得无影无踪，疲惫地看了一眼婕伊。当婕伊肯定地朝他点了点头之后，他重重地叹了口气。{/n}“是啊，确实如此，她已经不再是那个姑娘了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Mercy winces in pain at your words, his face no longer guarded by the lavish armour of his self-assurance. After tossing a weary look at Jae and receiving an affirmative nod from her, he sighs heavily:{/n} "It is true. She is a different person now."

traits.locale_text: {n}听到你的话，悯慈痛苦地抽搐了一下。他脸上自豪的表情消失得无影无踪，疲惫地看了一眼婕伊。当婕伊肯定地朝他点了点头之后，他重重地叹了口气。{/n}“是啊，确实如此，她已经不再是那个姑娘了。”
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}マーシーは、あなたの言葉に苦痛の表情を浮かべる。その表情には、もはや自己満足の鎧は剥ぎ取られていた。ジェイに疲れたような視線を投げかけ、彼女が肯定のうなずきを返すと、彼は大きくため息をついた。{/n}「どうやらそのようだ。彼女はいまやまったくの別人物だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Mercy winces in pain at your words, his face no longer guarded by the lavish armour of his self-assurance. After tossing a weary look at Jae and receiving an affirmative nod from her, he sighs heavily:{/n} "It is true. She is a different person now."

traits.locale_text: {n}マーシーは、あなたの言葉に苦痛の表情を浮かべる。その表情には、もはや自己満足の鎧は剥ぎ取られていた。ジェイに疲れたような視線を投げかけ、彼女が肯定のうなずきを返すと、彼は大きくため息をついた。{/n}「どうやらそのようだ。彼女はいまやまったくの別人物だ」
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Mercy hace una mueca de dolor. Ha perdido la confianza, dejando que su rostro refleje sus emociones. Tras lanzar una mirada agotada a Jae y recibir un asentimiento por respuesta, suspira profundamente:{/n} «Es cierto. Es una persona diferente».
languages.original_text: {n}Mercy winces in pain at your words, his face no longer guarded by the lavish armour of his self-assurance. After tossing a weary look at Jae and receiving an affirmative nod from her, he sighs heavily:{/n} "It is true. She is a different person now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mercy hace una mueca de dolor. Ha perdido la confianza, dejando que su rostro refleje sus emociones. Tras lanzar una mirada agotada a Jae y recibir un asentimiento por respuesta, suspira profundamente:{/n} «Es cierto. Es una persona diferente».
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Vos paroles brisent l'assurance de Mercy, qui grimace de douleur. Il lance un regard fatigué à Jae, qui lui répond d'un hochement de tête, puis soupire lourdement.{/n} « C'est vrai. Cette personne n'existe plus. »
languages.original_text: {n}Mercy winces in pain at your words, his face no longer guarded by the lavish armour of his self-assurance. After tossing a weary look at Jae and receiving an affirmative nod from her, he sighs heavily:{/n} "It is true. She is a different person now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vos paroles brisent l'assurance de Mercy, qui grimace de douleur. Il lance un regard fatigué à Jae, qui lui répond d'un hochement de tête, puis soupire lourdement.{/n} « C'est vrai. Cette personne n'existe plus. »
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Mercy zuckt durch deine Worte vor Schmerz zusammen, sein Gesicht hat die Fassade seiner Selbstsicherheit verloren. Nach einem müden Blick in Jaes Richtung und nachdem er erkennt, dass sie zustimmend zunickt, seufzt er tief:{/n} "Es stimmt. Sie ist jetzt ein anderer Mensch."
languages.original_text: {n}Mercy winces in pain at your words, his face no longer guarded by the lavish armour of his self-assurance. After tossing a weary look at Jae and receiving an affirmative nod from her, he sighs heavily:{/n} "It is true. She is a different person now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mercy zuckt durch deine Worte vor Schmerz zusammen, sein Gesicht hat die Fassade seiner Selbstsicherheit verloren. Nach einem müden Blick in Jaes Richtung und nachdem er erkennt, dass sie zustimmend zunickt, seufzt er tief:{/n} "Es stimmt. Sie ist jetzt ein anderer Mensch."
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Merhamet, sözlerin karşısında acıyla irkiliyor. Yüzü, artık o kalın kendinden eminlik zırhı tarafından korunmuyor. Jae'a bitkin bir bakış atıyor ve karşılığında onaylar anlamda bir baş hareketi alıyor, ardından derin bir iç çekiyor.{/n} "Doğru. O artık farklı bir insan."
languages.original_text: {n}Mercy winces in pain at your words, his face no longer guarded by the lavish armour of his self-assurance. After tossing a weary look at Jae and receiving an affirmative nod from her, he sighs heavily:{/n} "It is true. She is a different person now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Merhamet, sözlerin karşısında acıyla irkiliyor. Yüzü artık o kalın kendinden eminlik zırhı tarafından korunmuyor. Jae'a bitkin bir bakış atıyor ve karşılık olarak onaylar anlamda bir baş hareketi alıyor, ardından derin bir iç çekiyor:{/n} "Doğru. Artık o farklı bir insan."
traits.speaker: Mercy
